mapper.select: select prop_id, user_id, address_province, address_city, address_area, address_street, address_detail, receive_name, receive_phone from isrp_user_prop where prop_id = #{propId}
mapper.insert: insert into isrp_user_prop(user_id, address_province, address_city, address_area, address_street, address_detail, receive_name, receive_phone) values (#{userId}, #{addressProvince}, #{addressCity}, #{addressArea}, #{addressStreet}, #{addressDetail}, #{receiveName}, #{receivePhone})

insert into isrp_user_prop(user_id, address_province, address_city, address_area, address_street, address_detail, receive_name, receive_phone) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.addressProvince}, #{entity.addressCity}, #{entity.addressArea}, #{entity.addressStreet}, #{entity.addressDetail}, #{entity.receiveName}, #{entity.receivePhone})

insert into isrp_user_prop(user_id, address_province, address_city, address_area, address_street, address_detail, receive_name, receive_phone) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.addressProvince}, #{entity.addressCity}, #{entity.addressArea}, #{entity.addressStreet}, #{entity.addressDetail}, #{entity.receiveName}, #{entity.receivePhone})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id), address_province = values(address_province), address_city = values(address_city), address_area = values(address_area), address_street = values(address_street), address_detail = values(address_detail), receive_name = values(receive_name), receive_phone = values(receive_phone)
mapper.update:
update isrp_user_prop
user_id = #{userId},
address_province = #{addressProvince},
address_city = #{addressCity},
address_area = #{addressArea},
address_street = #{addressStreet},
address_detail = #{addressDetail},
receive_name = #{receiveName},
receive_phone = #{receivePhone},
where prop_id = #{propId}
